summary:
This is a re-texture of vanilla glass weapons (and shield too), simply to satisfy my personal favor.

Adds some transparency to glass part, toned the color up to amend the color loss on transparency.
descriptionHtml:
Sorry for poor English.

This is a re-texture of vanilla glass weapons (and shield too), simply to satisfy my personal favor.

Adds some transparency to glass part, toned the color up to amend the color loss on transparency. 

Install:

Copy (over-write) to the folders accordingly.

Uninstall:

Delete related files from folders.

Known bugs:

Bow may drop very far away (almost unable to locate) or drop through floors (mostly unable to retrieve) when drop from inventory. Not sure what caused this but seems like nifskope still not doing good at this part. Same problem can be re-produced after saving vanilla mesh even without any modification added.)

Items vanished on drawing when shown with other semi-transparency effects overlapped (ie:water surface). It may cause glass arrows harder to retrieve floating on water surface. Don\'t know if it\'s supposed to be so when drawn, or change to a much proper alpha-property flag will help or not.
author: kaw

files.name: Transparent Glass Weapons 0point91
files.changelogHtml:
Certain glass parts are now transparent.
Added the missing texture of chillend (a magical glass weapon with different color in game)
Optional \"Icy\" look texture replacement for chillend.
